description: Mike Green was the Chief Operating Officer of the Department for Education and Director General of the Operations Directorate between 2012 and 2022. His previous roles included: Director of Commercial, DfE Departmental lead for the response to Grenfell Director of Capital, Education and Skill Funding Agency Mike is a graduate of the Major Projects Leadership Academy (MPLA) at Saïd Business School, Oxford University and was Senior Responsible Officer for 2 of the department’s major programmes. Before joining the Civil Service, Mike was a civil engineer and spent his career in the private sector working for companies such as Boots.

details.body:
Mike Green was the Chief Operating Officer of the Department for Education and Director General of the Operations Directorate between 2012 and 2022.

His previous roles included:

  • Director of Commercial, DfE
  • Departmental lead for the response to Grenfell
  • Director of Capital, Education and Skill Funding Agency

Mike is a graduate of the Major Projects Leadership Academy (MPLA) at Saïd Business School, Oxford University and was Senior Responsible Officer for 2 of the department’s major programmes.

Before joining the Civil Service, Mike was a civil engineer and spent his career in the private sector working for companies such as Boots.

Mike Green was the Chief Operating Officer of the Department for Education and Director General of the Operations Directorate between 2012 and 2022.

His previous roles included:

  • Director of Commercial, DfE
  • Departmental lead for the response to Grenfell
  • Director of Capital, Education and Skill Funding Agency

Mike is a graduate of the Major Projects Leadership Academy (MPLA) at Saïd Business School, Oxford University and was Senior Responsible Officer for 2 of the department’s major programmes.

Before joining the Civil Service, Mike was a civil engineer and spent his career in the private sector working for companies such as Boots.

The Director of the Capital Directorate is responsible for managing the delivery of building and maintenance programmes for schools and sixth-form colleges. This includes project managing new builds for schools in greatest need.

Mike Green was the Chief Operating Officer of the Department for Education and Director General of the Operations Directorate between 2012 and 2022.

His previous roles included:

  • Director of Commercial, DfE
  • Departmental lead for the response to Grenfell
  • Director of Capital, Education and Skill Funding Agency

Mike is a graduate of the Major Projects Leadership Academy (MPLA) at Saïd Business School, Oxford University and was Senior Responsible Officer for 2 of the department’s major programmes.

Before joining the Civil Service, Mike was a civil engineer and spent his career in the private sector working for companies such as Boots.

The Chief Operating Officer (COO) is a member of the Department for Education board, audit and risk committee, implementation committee and the department’s leadership team. The COO is responsible for:

  • effective management of the department’s resources
  • delivery and improvement of the main corporate functions including analysis, international education, data, technology, human resources, finance and commercial
  • governance and relationship with DfE’s non-departmental public bodies

Non-departmental responsibilities include non-executive member of Palace of Westminster, Northern Estate Programme.

role.title: Chief Operating Officer, Insight, Resources and Transformation

role_appointments.title: Mike Green - Chief Operating Officer, Insight, Resources and Transformation

The Chief Executive (CE) Defence Infrastructure Organisation (DIO) is responsible for leading the DIO and its Executive Team. CE is responsible for developing and delivering against infrastructure objectives and deliverables set out in the Defence Plan, Defence Infrastructure Direction and Command Infrastructure Delivery Plans.

The CE’s responsibilities include:

  • ensuring a safe and legally compliant estate
  • setting the strategic plan and objectives for the organisation
  • accounting to the Service Chiefs for agreement and subsequent delivery for their programme of work and provision of service
  • implementing the 10-year strategy
  • ensuring an aligned long-term workforce strategy
